title: The Mars moment: Why now is the time to build the future
summary:

summary:

title: SpaceX launches final Version 2 Starship-Super Heavy rocket
summary: This was the fifth and final flight of this iteration of the rocket, which has been marred by a number of setbacks. The first Starship Version 3 is expected to debut in 2026.

title: Starship successfully completes 11th flight test
summary:
SpaceX successfully completed the final flight of version 2 of Starship on Oct. 13, performing in-flight tests as the company prepares to introduce an upgraded version of the reusable rocket.
